website_summaries.verdict: Popular rechargeable batteries by a top brand that come complete with a charger for added convenience.
pros: These batteries earn high marks for durability and versatility
cons: A few users report the batteries need frequent recharging

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Charger to replace an old Duracell charger which started to make noise during the charge process. Unfortunately, does not charge my old Duracell NiMH batteries (AA, AAA) reporting them as defected, but which are still works properly when are charged with the older unit. The batteries which came with the charger are working properly, that's why I am offering 3 stars but based on my expectations, I would give only one star... :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the battery does not charge very well. You must recharge almost every other day. Pay attention before buying because it can not be returned!
customer_reviews.author: William Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Had corners  cut open on om packaging
customer_reviews.text: Open package just cone but means it been returned or messed with both are not what I payed for.battery where 2 1.2 v 2500 mag AA/2 1.2v 900 mAh aaa. All four battery's are full changed holding 1.3v day of receiving no chagrin but as said before the package was opened so still fell that this where used already
customer_reviews.author: dm29

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this charger.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this charger to try and save the disposable batteries. The charger stated the batteries were ready and when I used them they last a half hour. I tried to recharge the batteries again and this charger became extremely hot. Fearing a fire could result, I returned the charger.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewC

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger for Rechargeable Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I use this to charge both Duracell AA & AAA rechargeable batteries. I have also used this charger to charge amazon rechargeable batteries as well. Charges amazon rechargeable batteries just fine. Have had no issues yet. Can charge either AA or AAA batteries but not at the same time. You either charge one type or the other but not at the same time. You cannot charge only one battery. You have to always charge in pairs or else it will not charge. You have to charge either 2 batteries or 4 batteries at the same time. Charges batteries pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Heraldo

customer_reviews.title: Works when it feels like working!
customer_reviews.text: Only charges batteries when it feels like doing so! I have spent days putting in batteries, plugging in the charger, then finding a minute or so later that the lights are blinking red. I have done this over and over and over with lots of different AA batteries, then all of a sudden, the same batteries that didn't work yesterday will start charging. AAA batteries usually, but not always, work the first time. I don't know if I just got a flaky unit or what.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: This the best version of this product !
customer_reviews.text: 3 months so far. Holds a charge for a VERY LONG TIME in: Remotes, console controllers, game boys and cameras. The charge speed is insanely fast, much better overall than my experience with Energizer's version.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVESTMENT FOR YOUR HOUSEHOLD
customer_reviews.text: I mean I don't know about you, but I have have a fair share of things that are run by batteries. And of course, batteries are not cheap and nor do I ever know how to properly dispose of them. Once my brother found theses (for his Xbox Controllers) he was obsessed. Then I won't on to buying them for my twinkling lights in my room, remotes, electric toothbrush, frothier, ect. They charge fast and last a fairly long time. If you are looking to help decrease your lithium pollution or just save some extra cash this is the product for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ayca A.

customer_reviews.title: had to do an exchange but Amazon was great
customer_reviews.text: my AA batteries gave a blinking red code on the charger after about a week. Exchanged product has been working great for about 2 months now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these in the past and liked them but they no longer include the Made in Japan batteries they now include 1300mah made in china batteries. The charger is pretty decent (must charge 2 at a time though) and I did need 2 AA and and 2 AAA (for a scale and a flashlight) so it's fine but if you are looking to use the batteries in high drain electronic devices I'd look for a set that includes batteries with a higher mah rating. I don't have prime but it was delivered very quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Skyler

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT. I DECIDED TO GET RE CHARGERABLE BATTERIES FOR A COUPLE OF MY CATS TOYS. ONE RUNS JUST ABOUT ALL THE TIME. IF IT'S NOT ON, ONE CAT SITS BY IT AND MEOWS. THE OTHERS WIL COME AND GET ME. SO THIS WORKS OUT BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Has been my go to for years. This upgraded charger is great! And its affordable!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous_

customer_reviews.title: Batteries last!
customer_reviews.text: I use mostly the AA batteries. I had the competitors brand. Those batteries, while rechargeable, didn't last very long in the device and I would be changing them often. That is not the case with these. Once charged they last a lot longer than the competitors before needing to be re-charged. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Larson

customer_reviews.title: Description not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because the description says specifically this comes with four (4) AA batteries. It came with two AA and two AAA batteries. I needed the four AA batteries specifically. It would have been nice if the advertising was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I could not be any happier. Buy this
customer_reviews.text: This little battery charger is fantastic. I bought 4 of them. It charges my AA & AAA batteries in half the time that my other chargers do and my batteries do not get hot with these chargers like my other's do.
customer_reviews.author: Harry E Swank

customer_reviews.title: Not even close. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Will not hold charge long enough to finish even a small job. I bought many for a headlamp. Had to switch back to regular batteries. BIG EXPENSE.
customer_reviews.author: Maryethel

customer_reviews.title: 1 battery DOA and charger won’t charge.
customer_reviews.text: So the charger doesn’t charge. One of the 2 AAA batteries is dead and won’t hold a charge. Pretty disappointing. Bought this to replace old Duracell unit, but now that older unit is the only charger that works. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Tired of paying high prices for batteries so I thought I'd give the rechargeable batteries a try!
customer_reviews.author: Tiggerbb59

customer_reviews.title: Name brand- works well - full set, can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for complete set and a name brand you can trust
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Used batteries that come with charger. They will not hold a charge and along with that when plugged in to charge nothing but blinking lights! Will not purchase Duracell products in the future
customer_reviews.author: ts

customer_reviews.title: They're Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Why must I review batteries? Seems a bit silly really. These are good rechargeable batteries

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other one I had
customer_reviews.text: My other Duracell battery charger just quit working. I like this one much better because you only have the one piece to plug in. Fast charger speed also!

customer_reviews.title: It has a hard time charging the batteries most of ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a hard time charging the batteries most of the time. it flashes red often. and just won't charge.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems good with this and the price was lower than in other stores..local and otherwise. It's so easy to use. good buy

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast. Charge doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: The charge could last longer. Disappointed. I got the 4000 hearing that’s the better way to go, does not last long. Charges fast though.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best batteries I've bought, a single charge last a little over 2 weeks In an Xbox controller, would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in bubble wrap package, but when I opened up the package, the item's plastic was damaged like in the picture I've posted. The rechargeable batteries it came with are 1300mAh as other customer's have complained and verified.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for a month now. Looks like everything good. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this item
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as depicted and described. Holds a good charge and very easy to charge. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I liked the assortment of batteries. I haven't found a store that sells more AA and AAA rechargeable batteries. After receipt ot charger, I realized I need about 10 AAA batteries for various remotes and toys

customer_reviews.title: Battery charger will come in handy
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Good to have as battery back up

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this charger to replace my old one of the same model. It works great. I was able to charge all of my rechargeable batteries in it.

customer_reviews.title: CHINESE BATTERIES

It is too early to determine the quality and durability of the batteries but the deception deserves only one star.

customer_reviews.text: I use with my wireless computer mouse & it saves me a lot of money

This is the first time I have purchased reusable batteries and they seem to work really well, the charging time is not bad only takes about an hour to get a full charge, they also tend to last quite a bit on a charge. Would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Battery capacity is exceptional! Batteries are charged quickly. Good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically so I wouldn't have to waste batteries but seems I'm only wasting my time and money now. The batteries came charged and worked great that first time however it seems the batteries, the base, or both are defective. I use the battery for a little over an hour and it dies. Also, when I put it on base to charge it either charges in less than 20 (only to die in an hour) or it never completely charges (the red light doesn't stop flashing).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AA seem to be working just fine / as expected
customer_reviews.text: When I try to charge the AAA batteries, the lights flash red and I'm therefore not able to...I haven't even used them yet! AA seem to be working just fine / as expected...

customer_reviews.text: Haven't had them long enough to really test longeivity so only 4 stars but very happy with charger size and effectiveness.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought I was ordering!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking I was paying for 4 AA, 8 AAA, and an ion speed 4000 charger. I got the charger, 2 AA, and 2 AAA batteries. I feel that the discription, and what I received are two different things. I'm not very satisfied, and feel I've been left shorted for what I thought I was paying for...
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the product and much cheaper buying them on Amazon than in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Ladina

customer_reviews.title: Good shipping, quality unit that works fine
customer_reviews.text: Good shipping, quality unit that works fine; office depot sold it for half price shortly after I received it. Minus two stars for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Samenater

customer_reviews.title: Misleading listing and weak batteries
customer_reviews.text: This was the listing when I bought: "Charges batteries in 1 to 2.5 Hours with 4000 mW charge power (To approx. 90 percent of full charge when using 1300mAh up to 2400mAh (included) 2xAA NiMH batteries." The set included two 1300mAh AA batteries, not 2400mAh. All the available rechargeable AA batteries for sale on Amazon are at least 2000 mAh. Why is Duracell even selling these--doing so tarnishes the brand. That Duracell itself posts the misleading listing saying 2400mAh is included is shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Strategic1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically for the Oculus Rift S controllers. So far the charging time has been wonderful, around an hour for a complete charge after being discharged almost completely. Normal non-rechargeable Duracell bateries lasted well with a with a very heavy use for a game like Beatsaber, these rechargeable batteries have lasted and performed just as well, perhaps even better, so I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I've already saved so much money on batteries. Yes they're pricy, but my batteries last for weeks and it's already paid for itself. Plus I don't feel like a terrible person for throwing out tons of batteries. A charge can take a couple hours, but then lasts for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Hello All, I think this product is great. Despite recieving the product in packaging that can be improved, I starting charging the batteries. The AAA took a very short while and they now power my primitive-survivor falshlight. They perform excellently. I am on my next charge of AA batteries that are taking a little longer since they are a higher capacity of 2400mAh. It looks like a great charger, and I hope the charge lasts as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and they charged in about an hour. Loved that!
customer_reviews.author: llamawoman60

customer_reviews.title: An excellent vallue!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I got the good ones (black tops). A regular Duracell battery will last about 3-4 hours (2 movies) on a roku controller listening through earbuds (Roku 3 and 4). These batteries last 3x that (about 9-12 hours or more) listening through Roku earbuds. AND they are rechargeable! An excellent vallue!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use charger
customer_reviews.text: This is great for recharging batteries I use in my solar lights outside. Have started using rechargeable batteries in other items since I always have some charged.

customer_reviews.title: Charger is worthless
customer_reviews.text: The batteries worked fine but the charger was garbage. Charged the batteries once then after that stopped working. Wasn't worth the hassle of warranty, I had an older charger also made by Duracell so I'm using that one.

customer_reviews.text: After about 60 days it now refuses to accept battery's. Red lights flash and wont charge. Even fully charged paired battery's wont be accepted. In the bin it goes. Very disappointed.

product_meta.title: Duracell - Ion Speed 4000 Battery Charger with 2 AA and 2 AAA Batteries - charger for Double A and Triple A batteries
product_meta.description: Size:4 Count| Style:Battery + ChargerThe Duracell Ion Speed 4000 NiMH Battery Charger offers amazingly fast charge times of 1 2.5 hours with 4000 mW of charging power. It recharges any rechargeable AA and AAA NiMH battery from any brand. You can recharge 2 or 4 batteries at a time and, with the LED Charge Status Indicator, you’ll know when charging is complete. It also features an Auto Shutoff so you won’t use any unnecessary electricity. It even has a bad battery indicator along with 9 smart safety features. Plus, the Duracell Rechargeable Pre Charged NiMH batteries are guaranteed to last 10 years. To approx. 85 percent of full charge when using 1300mAh up to 2500mAh 2xAA NiMH Batteries (included). Based on charging AA batteries. Or 400 recharges, whichever comes first.
feature_bullets: Charges batteries in 1 to 2.5 Hours with 4000 mW charge power (To approx. 90 percent of full charge when using 1300mAh up to 2400mAh (included) 2xAA NiMH batteries. Based on charging AA batteries.)
It recharges any rechargeable AA and AAA NiMH batteries from any brand
LED Charge Status Indicator shows when charging is complete and Auto Shutoff when batteries are charged
This battery charger works with all rechargeable AA and AAA NiMH batteries
The Duracell Ion Speed 4000 Battery Charger charges 2 or 4 batteries at a time
